languages.text: "Священный экстерминатус... я впервые видела его во всем его огненном величии..."
"The sacred Exterminatus... I saw it for the first time in all its fiery majesty..."
languages.original_text: "Священный экстерминатус... я впервые видела его во всем его огненном величии..."

traits.locale_text: "The sacred Exterminatus... I saw it for the first time in all its fiery majesty..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “神圣的灭绝令……我第一次亲眼目睹它那炽热的威严与宏伟……”
languages.original_text: "The sacred Exterminatus... I saw it for the first time in all its fiery majesty..."

traits.locale_text: “神圣的灭绝令……我第一次亲眼目睹它那炽热的威严与宏伟……”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « L'Exterminatus sacré... C'est la première fois que je le voyais dans toute sa majesté... »
languages.original_text: "The sacred Exterminatus... I saw it for the first time in all its fiery majesty..."

traits.locale_text: « L'Exterminatus sacré... C'est la première fois que je le voyais dans toute sa majesté... »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «El sagrado Exterminatus... por primera vez, puedo verlo en todo su ardiente esplendor...».
languages.original_text: "The sacred Exterminatus... I saw it for the first time in all its fiery majesty..."

traits.locale_text: «El sagrado Exterminatus... por primera vez, puedo verlo en todo su ardiente esplendor...».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「聖なる〈究極浄化〉（エクステルミナートゥス）だ…燃えさかる威厳のすべてにそれを見たのは初めてだ…」
languages.original_text: "The sacred Exterminatus... I saw it for the first time in all its fiery majesty..."

traits.locale_text: 「聖なる〈究極浄化〉（エクステルミナートゥス）だ…燃えさかる威厳のすべてにそれを見たのは初めてだ…」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Der heilige Exterminatus ... Ich habe ihn zum ersten Mal in all seiner feurigen Erhabenheit gesehen ..."
languages.original_text: "The sacred Exterminatus... I saw it for the first time in all its fiery majesty..."

traits.locale_text: "Der heilige Exterminatus ... Ich habe ihn zum ersten Mal in all seiner feurigen Erhabenheit gesehen ..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The sacred Exterminatus... I saw it for the first time in all its fiery majesty..."

languages.text: "Kutsal Eksterminatus... İlk kez yakıcı ihtişamıyla görme fırsatına nail oldum..."
languages.original_text: "The sacred Exterminatus... I saw it for the first time in all its fiery majesty..."
